amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Correctional Services; license plates; materials; Department of Motor Vehicles; duties.
amendatorysection.para: Out of the fund appropriated by the Legislature, the Department of Correctional Services shall purchase the materials for, manufacture, and deliver the license plates each year to the various counties in the State of Nebraska. The Department of Motor Vehicles shall furnish the information concerning license plates, together with the number of plates to be manufactured for each county in the state for the current licensing year, to the Department of Correctional Services.
